item.title: About Me :)
item.description: Hi there ðŸ‘‹ ! I’m NotTurtle (or NotTurtle01, as u prefer), thrilled to share a bit about myself with you. Let’s dive into the traditional whoami and what I’m passionate about. I am currently studying Artificial Intelligence (AI) ðŸ‘¾ and have just begun my journey in this exciting field. My most frequently-used language would be Python and HTML-CSS to do some basic web-development work. In the short term I would like to learn how to handle databases better, reinforce my (limited for now) knowledge in networks and learn more about neural networks and machine-learning.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction So… I suppose this is the beginning of something. My usual nickname is NotTurtle and I’m pleased to welcome you to my Blog. Please, feel comfortable. Let’s Start! :) LoL Call me a hero.
